content: Do not know if it is true or not, but the scenario sounds plausible. Why did it drag out as long as it did? Why were the sammies not shot when Phillips jumped into the water? True there is not really an upside to the situation. If you shoot them (as happened) then the cry is to attack US ships. Negotiate then the lesson is the Americans will not want to get involved and will negotiate, the cry is to seize US ships. Should have just ended it the first day.

content: quote: Originally posted by Motive25: Shot by who? Captain Phillips tried to escape on Thursday night. The SEALs did not arrive until Saturday night. You want a bunch of joe-average sailors to give it their "best shot" and pray? Captain was in the water, how much skill is needed to fill the lifeboat with lead ? You saying the navy trained sailors aren't capable of putting a few hundred rounds through a bright orange target ?? They certainly could've kept the pirates 'entertained' while the captain swam to a recoverable position. The story that the Obama administration gave orders not to shoot the pirates is believable, tho like most scenarios where the government is involved we will prolly never know the true story.

title: Truth Behind Maersk Alabama (?)

content: quote: Originally posted by Motive25: Shot by who? Captain Phillips tried to escape on Thursday night. The SEALs did not arrive until Saturday night. You want a bunch of joe-average sailors to give it their "best shot" and pray? Captain was in the water, how much skill is needed to fill the lifeboat with lead ? You saying the navy trained sailors aren't capable of putting a few hundred rounds through a bright orange target ?? They certainly could've kept the pirates 'entertained' while the captain swam to a recoverable position. The story that the Obama administration gave orders not to shoot the pirates is believable, tho like most scenarios where the government is involved we will prolly never know the true story.
quote: Originally posted by Motive25: Shot by who? Captain Phillips tried to escape on Thursday night. The SEALs did not arrive until Saturday night. You want a bunch of joe-average sailors to give it their "best shot" and pray?
